scripts.dev: concurrently  " npm run clientDev " "npm run serverDev"
scripts.serverDev: cd server && npm run dev && cd ..
scripts.installDeps: cd app && npm install && cd .. && cd server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.clientProd: cd app && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.serverProd: cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run clientProd && npm run serverProd
